E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 6/16/1978
Subject: Progress of Juan Bernhardt
Dear Sir,
Juan Bernhardt has nothing more to prove at AA Chattanooga Lookouts!
He has an AVG of .419 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 6/17/1978
Subject: Progress of Bob Detherage
Dear Sir,
Bob Detherage has nothing more to prove at A Waterloo Indians!
He has an AVG of .373 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 6/18/1978
Subject: I am a starter...
... so would you please put me in the rotation?
I want to go out there and start for my
team. Please come on, manager!

Regards,
Bill Hands



Date: Thursday, 6/19/1978
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Dave McNally
